sentence: rotate the rear left yellow block by 45 degrees and align it with the rear side of the left red block
rotate the foremost yellow block by 45 degrees and align it with the right side of the yellow block you just moved
pick up the green block next to the front yellow block and place it behind the yellow block you just moved
stack the left red block on top of the second yellow block from the left
place the foremost green block in front of the leftmost yellow block
stack the right yellow block on the green block you just moved
